Subject: Re: Destructor confronts Kit Kat

::KitKat::

She sighed and listened to him. "Destructor, I trust you.  I value 
your word.  And yes, I agree, killing the Allience would make it 
weasier to kill the Maximals.  But my thinking is this, why not kill 
two birds with one stone.  Have Megatron fight the maximals and let 
Megatron get himself killed off.  Then we with Aracnia's help can 
fight the allience.  Once that is done, then we can finish off what 
few maximals might remain.  Or do you think that I am not thinking 
clearly.  I would let the others perrish, but our pack here would 
remain.  I won't put you or the others in any risk unless absolutly 
nessassary.  I don't want to loose my pack. Please tell me you 
understand this.  You, Drillbit, Starscream, Famine, all others.  I 
am not like other Predacon leaders.  I will not sacrifice my pack for 
myself.  I would rather give myself up and die before I loose any of 
you."







--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  He swallowed. He didn't know what he could do. "Do not be angry 
with me. But 
> we must discuss this. I care for you too much at this point to see 
you make 
> this mistake. Megatron will only cause your death. I am aware of 
your clone 
> of yourself." he went on a knee and lowered his head..."I will not 
let it 
> come to that and that is why I need you to trust in my judgment. I 
know that 
> why you chose me for advisor. But also if you keep makeing plans 
against the 
> maximals than my total plan woll fall apart. Even if you try to 
destroy the 
> maximals the allaincw will always end up saveing them. So we must 
attack the 
> head. Destroy the alliance first. Then the maximals." he stood up 
and awaited 
> for a responce.
